ISSUE.TITLE: ShipStation configuration page. Hide "Package volume" if "Pass dimensions" checkbox is unticked; use nested settings there
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 BETA Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. go to ShipStation configuration page 2. tick "Pass dimensions" 3. select "Pass dimensions" in the "Packing type" field 4. untick "Pass dimensions" 5. see that the "Package volume" field is still here There is also no nested settings design

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5488 Use nested settings on ShipStation config page
